justification: The candidate has extensive leadership roles across multiple positions, implying strong leadership skills.
Experience in sales and market planning aligns well with the Business Development Manager role, demonstrating relevant experience.
CRM proficiency in Salesforce is present, meeting the minimum requirement for the job.
The resume lacks explicit mention of proposal writing and digital marketing skills, which are crucial for the role.

requirements.criteria: Proficiency in CRM tools like Salesforce or HubSpot

input.job_description:
**Title: Business Development Manager**  

**Company: MarketPros Enterprises**  

**Location: Remote with potential travel to client locations**  

**About Us:**  
MarketPros Enterprises is a leading global provider of innovative business solutions with the aim of maximizing brand growth. We work with diverse industries to enhance their sales infrastructure and provide unparalleled customer engagement strategies.  

**Role Overview:**  
As a Business Development Manager at MarketPros Enterprises, you will be responsible for leading strategic initiatives that drive business growth, increase market share, and strengthen client relationships. You will manage cross-functional teams to implement sales strategies, harness market insights, and drive brand expansion.  

**Key Responsibilities:**  
- Develop and implement comprehensive business strategies to enhance revenue growth.  
- Lead a team in executing marketing campaigns and optimizing sales pipelines.  
- Utilize data analytics tools to produce actionable insights improving overall performance.  
- Conduct market research to identify industry trends and new business opportunities.  
- Engage with potential clients via presentations and foster long-term relationships.  
- Manage CRM systems (Salesforce, HubSpot) to streamline operations and enhance productivity.  

**Preferred Skills:**  
- Proficiency in strategic planning and market analysis.  
- Strong leadership skills with proven experience in team development.  
- Advanced knowledge of CRM software and digital marketing tools.  
- Excellent communication and negotiation skills.  

Join us to push the boundaries of business innovation and help us achieve our expansion goals.
input.additional_info: MarketPros Enterprises values diversity in hiring and encourages applications from seasoned business professionals with varied backgrounds. Preferred universities include Ivy League institutions and top business schools. We offer relocation benefits for exceptional candidates and facilitate remote working arrangements. Technical and strategic competencies are assessed through a mix of psychometric evaluations and case study interviews.
minimum_requirements: Proficiency in CRM tools like Salesforce or HubSpot

details.name: Muhammad Bilal Amin
details.executive_summary: Muhammad Bilal Amin is a skilled professional with extensive experience in sales management and data analysis, currently serving as a Key Account Manager at Signify Pakistan. He has a strong background in marketing management and planning, demonstrating a proven ability to improve operational efficiency and drive sales growth.

employment_history.details: Managing total of 15 Accounts Including both End Users and Channel Partners for Retail & Hospitality Business Across Pakistan. Managing the largest EU account with approx. 700K EUR business for Signify Pakistan. Started engagement with 10 different new fashion retail potential accounts in line with Signify’s expansion strategy in R&H segment. Delivered and exceeded both top line and bottom-line targets with 120% attainment in topline in Q4 2022.

Improved the efficiency of the planning cycle with timely delivery of forecasting and planning report by at least 10%. Made a reconciliation and availability tool for the better planning of CBU vehicles. Improve the MOM CBU invoicing performance by 100%. Strong coordination between marketing, sales, and planning team to get the optimum demand forecast based on n+3 approach.

Was part of the launch team for Toyota Gateway Motors. Ensure all the branding is accurately done before the dealership launch. Learned and understood all the Toyota Policies and procedures for dealership opening. Researched the current dealership data across Pakistan auto sector and created a dashboard (Power BI) analyzing the dealership data in Pakistan in different metrics (dealership counts, geographies, average sales per dealership etc.).

Supported in Product Roadmap for the coming future portfolios. Conducting a successful training for SFDC to Sub Sahara Africa Market with more than 17 people in training. Conducted anonymous market visits to get the primary insights of the current market/competition situation. Hands on command on Vistex Tool, trained the PMs in Pakistan on the use of Vistex. Communicating with the Marcom team regarding the ongoing and upcoming campaigns. Achieved 15% improvement in data quality of pricing activities by collaborating with regional commercial operations team to achieve monthly targets. Increased profitability by 10% by forecasting channel sales and IGM with 95% accuracy. Improved decision making by providing comprehensive weekly performance reports to the commercial head, resulting in a 20% improvement.

Coordinated national sales for professional lighting, resulting in 15% sales growth. Improved sales team productivity by 20% as key user for Sales Force Dot Com. Provided weekly performance reports to commercial director, improving accuracy and timeliness by 25%. Improved sales and profitability forecasting accuracy by 5%, resulting in a 10% profit increase.

Marketing Intern at Signify Pakistan Limited.
Marketing Intern at Hilton Pharma Pvt Limited.
Trade and Revenue Management Intern at Sanofi Pakistan.
